definition: a small rectangular free-reed instrument having a row of free reeds set back in air holes and played by blowing into the desired hole, come back to
details:
noun
- a small rectangular free-reed instrument having a row of free reeds set back in air holes and played by blowing into the desired hole
= synonyms: harmonica
- a chordophone that has a triangular frame consisting of a sounding board and a pillar and a curved neck
- a pair of curved vertical supports for a lampshade
verb
- come back to
= synonyms: dwell
- play the harp
= example: play the harp
